rooms.name: King Double Room
rooms.summary:
Enjoy excellent stay in our comfortable King room with large Double bed. High speed wireless internet is available in every room. Complimentary toiletries are available in well-designed bathrooms.

Please NOTE: From the 1st of November to check-in to the hotel the guests should have either negative coronavirus (COVID-19) PCR test result or the certificate of full vaccination.

rates.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation before 2/4/2022 at 2:00 PM. If cancelled after this or in the event of a no-show at the hotel, the first night without extras is charged and non-refundable.
rates.title: Deal -12%, Room Only
rates.subTitle: cancellation fees
rates.deposit: No guarantee deposit. The credit/debit card number is required but the card will not be debited.
rates.taxAndFees: Taxes included. Note that stay tax may apply, in that case, its amount will be indicated at the booking step. No booking fees.
excludedTaxes: City Tax : EUR1.80 per person per night

rates.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation before 2/4/2022 at 2:00 PM. If cancelled after this or in the event of a no-show at the hotel, the first night without extras is charged and non-refundable.
rates.title: Sky Love Package
rates.summary:
As Valentine's Day approaches, we have prepared something special for you... Accommodation in Sky Loft Kyiv Hotel by Rixwell with tasty dinner at the Easy Breezy restaurant and breakfast for two.

Offer includes:
Accommodation in a King Double room or Superior Double room with breakfast, 2 days 1 night
Dinner for 2 people at the Easy Breezy restaurant
Early check-in (from 09.00) or late check-out (until 15.00) - at your choice
Sweet present from the hotel
Panoramic view of the city
rates.deposit: No guarantee deposit. The credit/debit card number is required but the card will not be debited.

rooms.name: Superior Sky King Double Room City view
rooms.summary:
Enjoy excellent stay with magnificent views in our Superior Sky King rooms. Modern interior and high quality amenities are welcoming you. Working area is equipped with ergonomic chair. High speed wireless internet is available in every room. Complimentary toiletries are available in well-designed bathrooms.

Please NOTE: From the 1st of November to check-in to the hotel the guests should have either negative coronavirus (COVID-19) PCR test result or the certificate of full vaccination.
